dev bot ids._comment: Used to calculate permissions for dev instance.
bot manager has permissions for everything when the bot id is a dev bot

bot manager ids._comment: Some operations are dangerous, like `eval` command.

bot usage channel whitelists._comment: Any guild with an entry here has the bot usage restricted to the listed channels.
Missing entry for a guild means all channels will work.

bot logger report channels._comment: For logging that isn't to console.

admin roles._comment: Some guilds use bots to manage, so checking perms isn't viable.
This option allows for custom admin roles to be used.
